title: / 1 Bath near Whole Foods Market
posting_body: ['Available now newly remodeled 1 bed/1 bath unit with new stainless steel appliances, quartz countertop, hardwood floors throughout, new canned lighting on dimmers is located in the hills of Adams Point just up the street from Whole Foods Market.', "Close to downtown Oakland, Lake Merritt and Children's Fairyland, 19th Street BART, Grand Avenue Farmers Market, historic Grand Lake Theater and Lakeshore Ave districts with unique boutique shopping, numerous dining options and more.", 'Car-free living is an option with multiple transit possibility as it is located near to East Bay arteries, including the 580, 880, 24 and easy Bay Bridge access.', "Lake Merritt's 3.5 trail, boat rental and playground encourages many activities for every lifestyle.", 'In order to observe the physical distancing requirement, we encourage you to make an appointment with a team member at your convenience for a tour through our beautifully remodeled unit.', 'Unit Features', '• All brand new stainless steel appliances (refrigerator, microwave, gas stove and dishwasher)', '• Quartz countertops', '• Lots of additional kitchen cabinet storage', '• Wood flooring throughout the unit', '• Mirror closet doors', '• On-Site laundry', '• New bathroom fixtures and finishes', '•', 'Gated Off street parking available ($100 per month)', 'Rental Features', '• Rent: $2,150.00 per month', '• Deposit: $2,250.00', '• Owner pays water and garbage, tenant responsible for PG&E, internet and cable.', '*Cats and dogs welcome ("25lbs or less, breed restrictions") considered with an additional deposit.', '• $30 Application fee', '• Rental Application requires Proof of Income, credit and rental history verification', 'Schedule Showings', 'Please feel free to call', 'show contact info', 'Radu, or email (no text) with any questions.', 'MMG302', 'CalBRE License #990193']
